summary: The carpennter Gamser from Garmisch-Patenkirchen, southern Germany, aims at success as a bobber at the Winter Olympics 1952. One of his opponents is his old rival Dorfler from his home country.
cast: Sebastian Bezzel|Michael A. Grimm|Simon Schwarz|Antoine Monot Jr.|Nicholas Ofczarek|Daniel Zillmann|Liane Forestieri|Lisa Maria Potthoff|Rike Schmid|Barbara Bauer|Maximilian Brückner|Horst Krause|Bastian Pastewka|Stefan Betz|Andreas Harwarth|Denise Zich|Martin Thamm|Sylvester Leo|Rainer Basedow|Tomas Dvorak|Lucas Bauer|Phillip Epping|Florian Thompson|Josef Friedl|Maximilian Frisch|Ferdinand Hofer|Julius Manner|Klaus Steinbacher|Pia Lautenbacher|Manuel Nürnberger|Daniel Unterrainer|Hansi Wagner|Martin Walch|Richard Oehmann|Aloisius Landgraf|Daniela Koch|Lubor Splíchal|Duke Faeger|Bohumir Stary|Stefanie von Poser|Ales Spurny|Jirí Chvalovsky|Frantisek Cacak|Brian Caspe|Julian Martin|Ryan James
title: Schwere Jungs
